post.summary: Register a Broker or Contractor via one-time link token
post.description:
Register a new Broker or Contractor using a one-time link token.

This endpoint requires different documents based on the user_type
stored in the OneTimeLink (Broker or Contractor).
For Broker:
- rera_cert, trade_license, bank_account, tax_registration (all required).
For Contractor:
- contract, trade_license, scope_of_work (all required).

An agreement PDF will be generated and returned in the response.

token.description: The OTL token from the link (determines user_type: Broker/Contractor)

password.description: User's password (min 6 chars), must match password_confirmation

rera_cert.description: Required if user_type is Broker (pdf, zip, jpg, jpeg, png)

trade_license.description: Required if user_type is Broker or Contractor (pdf, zip, jpg, jpeg, png)

bank_account.description: Required if user_type is Broker (pdf, zip, jpg, jpeg, png)

tax_registration.description: Required if user_type is Broker (pdf, zip, jpg, jpeg, png)

contract.description: Required if user_type is Contractor (pdf, zip, jpg, jpeg, png)

scope_of_work.description: Required if user_type is Contractor (pdf, zip, jpg, jpeg, png)

201.description: User registered successfully, awaiting approval, agreement generated

agreement_url.description: URL to the generated agreement PDF

400.description: Invalid or already used token / Invalid user_type

422.description: Validation error (e.g., missing docs, password mismatch)

500.description: Server error while creating user or generating PDF

get.summary: Generate or download a Reservation Form PDF for a booking
get.description:
Generate or retrieve a Reservation Form for a booking.

If a Reservation Form already exists (and its PDF file is present on disk), the existing PDF is streamed back (HTTP 200).
Otherwise, a new PDF is generated, stored, and streamed back (HTTP 201).

parameters.name: bookingId
parameters.description: ID of the booking for which to generate or retrieve the RF

200.description: Existing Reservation Form PDF streamed successfully

201.description: New Reservation Form PDF generated and streamed successfully

403.description: Forbidden (no permission to generate reservation form)

404.description: Booking not found or existing PDF file missing on disk

422.description: Validation or business-rule error (e.g. unit/booking status invalid)

post.summary: Upload a signed Reservation Form for a booking
post.description:
Upload a signed Reservation Form (RF) file for a booking.

This endpoint accepts a PDF file for the ReservationForm associated with the given booking.
If the RF is no longer "Pending", only users with the "CEO" or "System Maintenance" roles
may overwrite it; otherwise a 409 Conflict is returned.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the booking whose ReservationForm will be updated

signed_rf.description: The signed Reservation Form file (PDF, max 2 MB)

403.description: Forbidden  missing permission to upload signed RF

404.description: Reservation Form not found for the given booking

409.description: Conflict  RF already signed and user lacks override role

422.description: Validation error (e.g., no file or wrong MIME type)

post.summary: Approve a signed Reservation Form
post.description:
Approve a signed Reservation Form.

Sets the Reservation Form status to "Approved", updates the related Booking status to "SPA Pending",
and records an Approval entry.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the booking whose ReservationForm will be approved

403.description: Forbidden  user lacks 'approve reservation form' permission

404.description: Reservation Form not found for the given booking

422.description: Cannot approve unless the form is Signed or other validation error
